item.title: Contact
item.description: We are here to help you Are you curious about something? Do you have some kind of problem with our products? Let us know and we’ll help you! But please, don’t send us paper mail. Let’s save forests together. Please feel free to contact us 24⁄7, but our business hours are: Mo-Fr, 10.00-18.00.

item.title: UF Soft - Home and building automation
item.description: We offer the following services: Home and building system integration: Lighting Curtains & motors HVAC Audio-Video Home Theatre Multiroom CCTV Water pools, garden irrigation, and more… We have in-house engineers experienced and certified for: Crestron KNX QSC RTI iRidi and more

item.title: UF Soft - Wi-Fi and wired networks
item.description: Buy it, install it, forget about itâ€¦ it just works. Unleash Wi-Fi in your business today. We are an authorized service provider of Ruckus (Commscope). We offer the following services: Network planning for new buildings Upgrade and troubleshooting for existing installations Equipment supply, deployment and configuration On-site and online end-user support Fast Wi-Fi that Works for Small Business Small businesses need fast, reliable and always-on Wi-Fi. However, small businesses often lack the budget, time and in-house resources to install and manage complex Wi-Fi deployments.

item.title: UF Software - development and distribution
item.description: Read more at official project website: www.diesel-rk.com We are an authorized distributor of scientific and engineering software. Our programmers are involved in the development, improvement and support of the following programs. DIESEL-RK is a full-cycle thermodynamic engine simulation software It is designed for simulating and optimizing the working processes of two- and four-stroke internal combustion engines with all types of boosting. The program can be used for modeling the following types of engines:
